pages.text: Astikor Carts Redux adds horse-drawn carts to Minecraft, making travel and farming much easier. Hitch up your horse, llama, or mule and hit the road in style!
Available Carts: - Plow Cart: Till a 3x3 area of land at once. - Storage Cart: Carry extra items while traveling. - Animal Cart: Bring your furry friends along on your journey.
How to Hitch Your Horse: To hitch your horse to a cart, simply right-click on the cart with a Lead while your horse is nearby. Ready your cart and enjoy the journey!
